author: Home RenoVision DIY
description:
Tired of water pooling around your home or leaking into the basement? In this video, I’ll show you how to install a French drain system to move water away from your foundation and protect your basement from flooding. I’ll also demonstrate how to add a trench drain in front of your garage to stop water from running toward your concrete slab, helping you avoid costly cracks and repairs. If you’re dealing with drainage problems, this step-by-step guide will give you the confidence to fix it yourself.If you found this video helpful, please subscribe. Hope you enjoy. Cheers!
